column4: I've never used this x-chat thing before, so I hope it's ok to just throw a question out there.  Is there an easy way to shift my /home directory into a new partition.  Do I simply create the partition, and then copy the contents into it. How do I make sure that the partition is mounted as /home?
Even the hidden files will move?
It's strange that the Warty default didn't give you a separate /home partition.  What is the reasoning behind that, does anyone know?
extraneous partitions on a desktop system just increase complexity and decrease flexibility
